name: Sockhop
description:
It's the classic tale of Sock vs. Monster come to life in this dramatic, pixelated interpretation of the legend!

This game was the result of trying out the Pico-8 Fantasy Console (which I found absolutely delightful).  Enjoy living out my 3am fever dreams while playing the role of... geez I never gave him a name... let's call him Socky... stomping all sorts of monsters and seeing how long you can survive!

Currently in beta, we have some plans for game balancing, bug fixes and some level redesign. 

Made with love by Holmade Games in 2020 ♥
